questions.question: This type of machine learning involves training a model on labeled data.
This algorithm is used for classification and regression tasks and works by finding the hyperplane that best separates the data into classes.
This term refers to the process of reducing the number of features in a dataset while retaining as much information as possible.
This type of neural network is commonly used for image recognition tasks.
This technique is used to prevent overfitting in machine learning models by adding noise to the input data during training.
